name: Plumber
description:
Plumber is an interesting puzzle game with interesting levels. Your task is to complete the puzzle in the allotted time on the level.
The goal of the game is to go through all the levels, and at the level you need to put pipes so that the sewage system does not flood you.

The game is waiting for you:

- Good background music
- 30 levels of varying difficulty
- Nice 2D graphics

Try to complete all levels faster than anyone!

Good luck and good game!
